page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: On one of our plots we had three local farms,'Broadmead','Woodrows' and 'Poplars'. We talked to the owners of the farms. Broadmead is a dairy farm owned by couple who moved there in 1964.They have opened a few of their fields for crops.Woodrows farm is a dairy farm. They have been there since 1961. They have opened most of their fields. Their land is rough grazing and five crop fields.The owners of Poplars farm have been farming for 15 years.They have an orchard,rough grazing fields and free range hens.They also grow seed crops. Each farmers told us that farming has become easier now that the farming equipment is more advanced.
